item.title: CVE-2024-32430|2024-04-15T07:14:25.402Z -- ActiveCampaign -- ActiveCampaign
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in ActiveCampaign.This issue affects ActiveCampaign: from n/a through 8.1.14.
